typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Date as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> pollutionschema
pollutionschema window(desc(Year, true),
	desc(Month, true),
	desc(Date, true),
	RowNumberSeq = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> window
